struct gstCollisionInfoStruct

Specifics about a single collision between the PHANToM and a shape.

From header file: gstCollisionInfo.h

gstPoint SCP;
gstVector SCPnormal;
double dynamicFriction;
gstShape* obj;
double staticFriction;
double surfaceDamping;
